conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a horror movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I think I have just the right horror movie for you!

If you're in the mood for something a bit more psychological and suspenseful, I'd recommend "Prison" (1987). This classic horror film features Viggo Mortensen in an early role, and its creepy atmosphere and haunting plot will keep you on edge. Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit more action-packed and nostalgic, "Scream 4" (2011) is a fun, self-aware horror movie that pays homage to the original while introducing new twists and characters.

Let me know if either of these pique your interest!
